0: The Priest's grey nimbus in a niche where he dressed discreetly.
1: I will not sleep here tonight. Home also I cannot go.
2: A voice, sweetened and sustained, called to him from the sea.
3: Turning the curve he waved his hand.  A sleek brown head, a seal's, far
4: out on the water, round.  Usurper.

20: phonescrot - screenshot program for connected Android devices
26: takes  a  screenshot  on any Android device (not necessarily a phone) connected to the PC
27: with USB debugging enabled, and saves the image. It can also upload the image to Imgur automatically.
28: This program is not related in any way to the other scrot program.

5: phonescrot - screenshot program for connected Android devices
11: takes  a  screenshot  on any Android device (not necessarily a phone) connected to the PC
12: with USB debugging enabled, and saves the image. It can also upload the image to Imgur automatically.
13: This program is not related in any way to the other scrot program.
